review: not good with my  equipment as it did not work. may have been a distance problem as wifi gate is in a different room about  25 feet  away. however  our kindle fires work fine. returning fire stick.

review: Plug n Play.  Worked right as soon as I plugged it in.  Great product.

review: I waited for 6 weeks to get this thing after X-mas, what a disappointment.  Even with a strong signal, picture always buffering, jumping, pausing...no fun to watch
